Description:
Detects the usage of "reg.exe" in order to dump sensitive registry hives. This includes SAM, SYSTEM and SECURITY hives.

Author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov, Endgame, JHasenbusch, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, oscd.community, frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Dumping of Sensitive Hives Via Reg.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '%\system%' or command like '%\sam%' or command like '%\security%' or command like '%\ˢystem%' or command like '%\syˢtem%' or command like '%\ˢyˢtem%' or command like '%\ˢam%' or command like '%\ˢecurity%') and (process_path like '%\reg.exe' and original_file_name = 'reg.exe') and (command like '% save %' or command like '% export %' or command like '% ˢave %' or command like '% eˣport %') and (command like '%hklm%' or command like '%hk˪m%' or command like '%hkey_local_machine%' or command like '%hkey_˪ocal_machine%' or command like '%hkey_loca˪_machine%' or command like '%hkey_˪oca˪_machine%'))
